output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows owner to set any user's balance, which is a severe vulnerability.
Integer overflow in buy function allows owner to arbitrarily increase contract balance, which is a severe vulnerability.
Integer overflow in transfer function allows owner to arbitrarily increase user balance, which is a severe vulnerability.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows owner to arbitrarily increase user balances, which is a severe vulnerability.
mintToken function allows arbitrary increase of tokens, allowing owner to increase supply arbitrarily, which is a severe vulnerability.
